alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:57PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 545 PM MST... At 457 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, or near Gila Bend, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, and Cotton Center. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 103 and 129. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 10. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 20, and between mile markers 119 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
